org.littleshoot.proxy

Class BaseProxyTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.littleshoot.proxy.AbstractProxyTest
      • org.littleshoot.proxy.BaseProxyTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseChainedProxyTest, ChainedProxyWithFallbackTest, MitmProxyTest, SimpleProxyTest, UsernamePasswordAuthenticatingProxyTest

    public abstract class BaseProxyTest
extends AbstractProxyTest
    Base for tests that test the proxy. This base class encapsulates all of the tests and test conditions. Sub-classes should provide different AbstractProxyTest.setUp() and AbstractProxyTest.tearDown() methods for testing different configurations of the proxy (e.g. single versus chained, tunneling, etc.).
